ticket.title: TB3.010: All emails are loading as though they were done in MSPUBLISHER
ticket.original-body:
Hello,
Other than I can't open links in any of my emails; I am now finding that ALL of my emails are downloading looking like they were done in MS PUBLISHER form, i.e., they have cells, etc.
I cannot find a solution to this problem on any of the forums that I have asked this question on and I have posted this question on many sites/forums.
Pleas, oh please, can you find a solution or find a site where others are having the same problem? And have fixed or addressed this problem?
Thank you.
Blessings.
Shiloh

version.title: TB3.010: All emails are loading as though they were done in MSPUBLISHER

version.body: This seems like a "your-application" bug and not a Rails bug. Please ask on the irc channel #rubyonrails on irc.freenode.net or http://stackoverflow.com
version.body-html: This seems like a "your-application" bug and not a Rails bug. Please ask on the irc channel #rubyonrails on irc.freenode.net or http://stackoverflow.com
